Introduction

BLANC7 was a seven-member boy group formed by Jackpot Entertainment. They debuted on March 3, 2017 with their first single "Prism".

On January 24, 2019, the group announced their disbandment on their official fan cafe. On May 2, 2019, across their social media accounts, the group was announced to make a 'restart'.
